show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com interviews Andrew Heineman. <!--more--> Andrew graduated from Pacific College of Oriental Medicine with a Master’s of Science in Traditional Chinese Medicine.
He apprenticed with Dr Wen-Chiang Pai who was the chair of the acupuncture department at the ChineseMedicalHospital in Taiwan.
He has studied many different energy modalities including qi gong, Taoist internal practices, Buddhist internal practices, jin shen, and reiki tummo.
He has been teaching Nutripuncture throughout the US, and assisted with the English translation of the book Nutripuncture: stimulating the meridians of the body without needles.  Contact: www.andrewheimann.com and www.Nutripuncture.com
